Expiration of Signed and Dated VA Forms 21-4142
The HIPPA Privacy Rule requires an authorization form to contain an expiration date or an expiration event that relates to the individual or the purpose of the disclosure
.
The completed
VA Form 21-4142
will expire one year from the date the claimant signs it.
Important
:
VA Form 21-4142
must be signed
and
dated to be considered complete. Request a completed form from the claimant if the signature or date is missing.
If
VA Form 21-4142
expires before VA can obtain the PHPâ€™s/Vet Center records, request the Veteran provide VA with an updated
VA Form 21-4142
.
Do not
request the Veteran complete an additional
VA Form 21-4142a
.
